attributes.action: Ban bonuses and pay rises to all bank staff and city traders at all levels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As at least one bank propped up by taxpayers cash openly promises to pay bonuses to staff, we the undersigned call for an immediate ban on bonuses and pay rises to all bank employees all share traders and all related industries

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
